title: kandanE iniyEnum
sahitya:
kandanE iniyEnum endan kurai tIrAyO undan kaN onrEnum tirandennai pArAyO


anupallavi

  inda vidamAgha nAn ettanai kAlam tAn cintai kavalaiyAlE nondu nalivEnO


caraNam    AkAshak-kOTTai kaTTa AshaippaDavillai ayyA sAgAdirukkum varam sAmi nAn kOravillai
bhOgAdi sukhattil manam pOgha viDAmalE un ponnaDi pOTruvEn unnaruL tArAyO
